org.synyx.messagesource.jdbc

Class JdbcMessageProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.synyx.messagesource.jdbc.JdbcMessageProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageAcceptor, MessageProvider

    public class JdbcMessageProvider
extends Object
implements MessageProvider, MessageAcceptor
    MessageProvider implementation that reads messages out of a database. The table to be used as well as the names of the columns is configurable.
    Author:
    Marc Kannegie√üer - kannegiesser@synyx.de
